name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.17.8-0a9700e6303f2d61cb1d994c84c7566c3a6632e3 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
